$AAPL 61.6% of Apple's revenue comes from iPhone sales, making it the company's most important sector. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-why-the-iphone-business-is-so-critical-to-apple-aapl/

links.title: Why the iPhone business is so critical to Apple (AAPL)
links.description: Apple, Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is enjoying soaring sales with iPhones, its most important product. Of Apple's $229.2 billion in revenue from fiscal year 2017, $141.3 billion came from iPhone sales, accumulating to equal nearly 61.6%. While a bit down from the previous year's 63.6%, 2018 has seen a continuation of Apple's strong reliance on the iPhone as the core of their business.
